Key: (I'm going to go check on Tohka.)

Tohka, I've come to help you...
What are you doing?

Oh, Shido! I'm going to make you eat the ultimate
meat dinner. Just you wait.
(On the cutting board was a big hunk of meat.)
Where did you get that thing...

What are you talking about? It was at the market
you took me to.

Are you serious? Since when has the market had a
section like this?

I asked a vendor at the meat corner, and he
brought me an industrial-sized portion.
Why would they do this?!

Just watch, Shido. I'm going to use the knife
to...
...Hngg...
Hnnn... This is hard...
Oh! I did it?!

Hey! What's the point in cutting
the cutting board?!
Hmm. This is hard.
No, the meat is too big...
Anyways, let's pan fry it.
You're going to cook it as is?!
Here we go.

Don't just sear it on the stovetop burner!
The oil! It's getting all over! Oh, God!

But Shido, I can't help it. It's not going to fit
into the frying pan.

I'll get you a little barbecue setup. So cook it
outside... Please.
Hmm.. Very well. I guess I'll do that.
I think that way it'll turn out more delicious.

Okay! Today I'm going to cook for you, so you wait
over there, Shido.
No, but... Are you sure you can cook it?
Leave it to me! Just go over and wait comfortably!

(...Fine. I guess it's pointless helping. I'll
have to give up here and place my bets elsewhere.)
